text.section: Any person who is convicted of a violation of § 22-404.4 of this article shall be fined $250.
Any person who is convicted of a violation of § 22-412.3 of this article is subject to a fine of not more than $25, including court costs.
Any person who is convicted of a violation of § 21-1003(u) or (dd) of this article is subject to a fine of $25.
